trigger: Ceiling cavity with active structural sag or collapse
action_item: Defer all weatherization until ceiling structure is assessed and stabilized by a qualified professional.
documentation: Photo of sagging or failed ceiling, inspection or repair documentation.
policy_text: Active structural failure must be addressed before insulation or shell work may proceed.

trigger: Visible wall or foundation crack, open to exterior
action_item: Seal or repair crack to maintain building envelope and prevent pest, water, or air infiltration before proceeding.
documentation: Photo of crack, repair documentation, and post-repair inspection.
policy_text: Building envelope must be intact before weatherization.

trigger: Unsealed or deteriorated exterior door frame
action_item: Repair or replace framing and seal to ensure integrity before shell measures or insulation.
documentation: Photo of repaired frame, sealant or flashing, and job note.
policy_text: Exterior door frames must be sound and weather-tight prior to air sealing.

action_item: Verify separation from conditioned space, adjust energy modeling, and correct air barrier if necessary.
documentation: Photo of greenhouse, boundary diagram, energy model update.
policy_text: Shell boundary and modeling must reflect attached structures open to interior.

trigger: Floor or wall cavity open and uninsulated
action_item: Insulate or dense-pack cavity prior to air sealing or blower door testing. Defer if area cannot be accessed or made safe.
documentation: Photo of open cavity, insulation record, post-install photo.
policy_text: Open framing and cavities must be insulated to program minimums before envelope work.
